A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Most of the bad reviews are people that went to the movie with too many fan theories in their heads. 

I'm one of the least harsh critics out there so I thought it was great. But I just really enjoy movies in general and especially Star Wars. 

The movie does a lot of unexpected things so go in with an open mind and just enjoy yourself. It's a big budget movie that takes actual risks\, which is a really cool thing to see nowadays.

There are definitely some glaring plot holes and a few character choices that are pretty illogical but is it really even a Star Wars movie with out those aspects?
